mapper.insert: insert business_point (id, point_code, point_name, point_ratio, create_by, create_time) values (#{PO.id}, #{PO.pointCode}, #{PO.pointName},#{PO.pointRatio}, #{PO.createBy}, #{PO.createTime})
update business_point set point_name = #{PO.pointName},point_ratio = #{PO.pointRatio} where id = #{PO.id}
